choices.text:
### Human:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
### Assistant:

Hi [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to let you know that I am writing to inform you that I will be leaving the company effective immediately.

It has been a pleasure working with you and everyone at the organization over the past [number of years]. I have learned a great deal during my time here, and I am grateful for all the opportunities and support you have provided me.

I understand that my departure may come as a surprise, but I have decided to pursue new opportunities outside of the company. I appreciate your understanding in this matter.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank you again for everything you have done for me during my time at [Company Name]. If there is anything else I can do to assist with the transition, please let me know.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
